basic_information.scholarship_name: Judge William S. Myers Award for Academic Excellence and Service in Sociology

description: This scholarship recognizes William S. Myers, Jr., a judge for over 25 years in the District Court of the State of Oklahoma, and his wife, Lucille, who taught English at UCO in the late 1960s. It is given to a junior or senior student selected by the faculty for high scholastic attainment and who exhibits strong writing skills. Eligibility Requirements Declared Sociology or Human Services major Minimum 3.5 GPA Participation in volunteer events in community or service in armed forces Preference given to Veterans with a minimum of 3.0 GPA

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
